chat_history.message:
Hello,
My product iPhone 13 has the above problem:
The condition of the article is not 'Excellent', with several visible scratches. Furthermore, the display is covered with fingerprints. That's not very professional. I would accept the optical condition if you could offer me a 10% discount. Best regards
Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

We would like to inform you that, in accordance with our Quality Charter, we will refund €60 to the customer for aesthetic discrepancy.

Kind regards, Diogo from Back Market
